mapper.select: select ifnull(count(*),0) from user where channel = #{channel}

select login_name from user where user.login_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{loginName}), '%') and exists(select 1 from user_role where user_role.login_name = user.login_name and user_role.role = 'STAFF')
select mobile from user where mobile like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{mobile}), '%')
